# Expanding tidy data principles to facilitate missing data exploration, visualization and assessment of imputations

This is the repository for the paper: "Expanding tidy data principles to facilitate missing data exploration, visualization and assessment of imputations" - you can find all the data and code to replicate the paper here.

- Note that you need to have the development version of `knitr` and `rmarkdown`
- Packages used described in `renv.lock` file
